channel.title: Posting topics regarding Bots and Ebooks
channel.description: Im just trying to find the rules that are saying the post gets deleted if you make a topic about this.

item.title: Posting topics regarding Bots and Ebooks
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

Eh i don’t mind about ausbot. I thought it would be a helpful post but i don’t care if it gets deleted.

But i don’t get why the free E-books got deleted.

It was very useful as many people like to make topics asking for guidance to learn coding. And i see all the spam that goes on in this forum that gets left open or just locked.

I post two useful topics and it gets deleted in half a day.

If your gonna delete helpful topics then why aren’t the mods/admins deleting all the shit that is flooding this damn section.

Read full topic
item.source: Posting topics regarding Bots and Ebooks
